Uses of Package
com.vmware.vcenter.hvc

  • Packages that use com.vmware.vcenter.hvc 
    Package Description
    com.vmware.vcenter.hvc
    The com.vmware.vcenter.hvc package provides interfaces to manage hybrid links between a local and remote Platform Service Controller.
  • Classes in com.vmware.vcenter.hvc used by com.vmware.vcenter.hvc 
    Class and Description
    HvcFactory
    HvcFactory is responsible for creating instances of services contained inside the com.vmware.vcenter.hvc package and also has the subpackages reference to access respective subpackage services.
    Links
    The Links interface provides methods to create, delete, get information, and list hybrid links between the local and foreign Platform Service Controller (PSC).
    Links.CreateInvocation
    Invocable that represents the Links#create vAPI operation.
    Links.DeleteInvocation
    Invocable that represents the Links#delete vAPI operation.
    Links.DeleteWithCredentialsInvocation
    Invocable that represents the Links#deleteWithCredentials vAPI operation.
    Links.GetInvocation
    Invocable that represents the Links#get vAPI operation.
    Links.ListInvocation
    Invocable that represents the Links#list vAPI operation.
    LinksTypes
    The Links interface provides methods to create, delete, get information, and list hybrid links between the local and foreign Platform Service Controller (PSC).
    LinksTypes.CertificateInfo
    The CertificateInfo class contains information about the SSL certificate for a destination PSC endpoint.
    LinksTypes.CreateSpec
    The CreateSpec class is the specification used for the hybrid link creation.
    LinksTypes.CreateSpec.Builder
    Builder class for LinksTypes.CreateSpec.
    LinksTypes.Credentials
    The Credentials interface specifies user credentials to make a successful connection to remote endpoint
    LinksTypes.Info
    The Info class contains information about link.
    LinksTypes.Info.Builder
    Builder class for LinksTypes.Info.
    LinksTypes.Info.HealthStatus
    The HealthStatus enumeration class defines the possible states for health of a link.
    LinksTypes.Info.HealthStatus.Values
    Native Java enum representing this enumeration class.
    LinksTypes.Summary
    The Summary class contains information about the hybrid link.
